nodes.text: B8-M2 was a battle droid in the employ of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. During the invasion of Belsavis, B8-M2 was stationed deep in the Tomb guarding one of the Rakata teleporters, and served as a communications link to Commander Vorel.
AR-72 appears on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where it is part of the Bonus Series for Imperial players.
